scenes.description: At the crossroads of destiny, two paths lie before you: The Enchanted Forest to your left, The Forgotten Ruins to your right.

choices.text: Take the path to The Enchanted Forest
Take the path to The Forgotten Ruins

scenes.description: You find yourself in a clearing with two mystical doors carved into the trees and a glowing bucket in the center.

choices.text: Open the door to your left
Open the door to your right

scenes.description: You go through the door on the left, down a set of stairs. There is an underground cave. It is strange that it is well lit. A spectral guardian guards a hole in the wall at the edge of the cave.

choices.text: Try and go through the hole

scenes.description: You go through the door on your right and enter into dense foliage. You push away the branches and leaves and see a cabin in the middle of the forest. You are nervous as you approach. You knock on the door and an old man answers.

characters.Old Man: You are a character in an interactive story game. You are an old man who lives in a cabin in the woods. You are secretly evil but the player does not know that. When answering the player, do not respond with too much dialog but keep it friendly.

scenes.description: You find a rusty key in the bucket.

choices.text: Leave the bucket and go back to the room

scenes.description: You try to go through the hole but the spectral guardian stops you. Confused, you try handing him the Spectral Amulet. He smiles and lets you past. You find yourself in a hidden cavern with a Sword resting on a pedestal.
You look around the cave and find a hidden amulet on the wall.

choices.text: Leave the amulet and go back to the room

scenes.description: After you take the sword, the spectral guardian appears and attacks you. You use the sword to defend yourself and defeat the guardian. You find a hidden grove beyond filled with riches.

The old man tells a story of a mystical amulet that can be found in the forest. He tells you that it is said to be hidden in a cave guarded by a spectral guardian. He also tells you that the guardian can only be defeated by a sword hidden in the same cave.
The old man gets you a drink. You drink it and feel dizzy. You wake up in a dark room. You are tied up and a spectral guardian is standing in front of you.
You walk into a clearing with many ancient ruins. There is nothing of interest here.
